job description:
Job Description
Role Data Engineer
Position Type Fulltime Permanent Role
Work Location Blue Ash, OH
Mandatory Technical / Functional Skills Overall 8+ Years of Experience in Python, PY Spark or Jupyter, Kubernetes (Plus)
Roles and responsibility Will be working on Big Data platforms on Informatics Cloud and Google Cloud using Python, PY Spark,Jupyter. Experience in Kubernetes is a plus.
Desirable Technical / Functional Skills Strong experience in Python, PY Spark or Jupyter
Total experience in required skill (years) 8 + years
